name: hot-keys-tuning
description: Unified keyboard productivity configuration system with Karabiner Elements, IdeaVim, and WebStorm integration

scripts.generate:docs: cd keyboard-config && source venv/bin/activate && python scripts/generate-docs.py
scripts.export:csv: cd keyboard-config && source venv/bin/activate && python scripts/export-csv.py
scripts.hooks:status: echo 'Project Hook Configuration:' && cat .claude/hooks/keyboard-config-hooks.json && echo '\nHook Logs:' && ls -la .claude/hooks/logs/*.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No logs yet' && echo '\nBackups:' && ls -la .claude/hooks/backups/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No backups yet'
scripts.setup: cd keyboard-config && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install PyYAML

author: Artem Sorochynskyi <caelum29@gmail.com>
